00011 #include "HybridNphMdMove.h"
00012 #include <mcMd/mcSimulation/McSystem.h>
00013 #include <mcMd/mdIntegrators/MdIntegrator.h>
00014 #include <mcMd/mdSimulation/MdSystem.h>
00015 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00016 #include <util/boundary/OrthorhombicBoundary.h>
00017 #include <util/ensembles/BoundaryEnsemble.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00019 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00020 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/MdPairPotential.h>
00021 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00022 #endif

00024 namespace McMd
00025 {
00026 
00027    using namespace Util;

00029    /*
00030    * Constructor
00031    */
00032    HybridNphMdMove::HybridNphMdMove(McSystem& system) :
00033       SystemMove(system),
00034       mdSystemPtr_(0),
00035       nStep_(0),
00036       nphIntegratorPtr_(0),
00037       barostatMass_(0.0),
00038       mode_()
00039    {
00040       mdSystemPtr_ = new MdSystem(system);
00041       oldPositions_.allocate(simulation().atomCapacity());
00042    }
00043 
00044    /*
00045    * Destructor.
00046    */
00047    HybridNphMdMove::~HybridNphMdMove()
00048    {
00049       if (mdSystemPtr_) {
00050          delete mdSystemPtr_;
00051       }
00052    }
00053 
00054    /*
00055    * Read parameter maxDisp
00056    */
00057    void HybridNphMdMove::readParam(std::istream& in)
00058    {
00059       readProbability(in);
00060       read<int>(in, "nStep", nStep_);
00061       readParamComposite(in, *mdSystemPtr_);
00062       
00063       nphIntegratorPtr_ = dynamic_cast<NphIntegrator*>(&mdSystemPtr_->mdIntegrator());
00064       
00065       barostatMass_ = nphIntegratorPtr_->barostatMass();
00066       mode_ = nphIntegratorPtr_->mode();
00067    }
00068 
00069    /*
00070    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Hybrid MD/MC move.
00071    */
00072    bool HybridNphMdMove::move()
00073    {
00074       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00075       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00076       double oldEnergy, newEnergy;
00077       int    iSpec;
00078       int    nSpec = simulation().nSpecies();
00079 
00080       bool   accept;
00081 
00082       if (nphIntegratorPtr_ == NULL) {
00083          UTIL_THROW("null integrator pointer");
00084       }
00085       // Increment counter for attempted moves
00086       incrementNAttempt();
00087       
00088       // Store old boundary lengths.
00089       Vector oldLengths = system().boundary().lengths();
00090 
00091       // Store old atom positions in oldPositions_ array.
00092       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpec; ++iSpec) {
00093          mdSystemPtr_->begin(iSpec, molIter);
00094          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00095             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00096                oldPositions_[atomIter->id()] = atomIter->position();
00097             }
00098          }
00099       }
00100 
00101       // Initialize MdSystem
00102       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00103       mdSystemPtr_->pairPotential().buildPairList();
00104       #endif
00105       mdSystemPtr_->calculateForces();
00106       mdSystemPtr_->setBoltzmannVelocities(energyEnsemble().temperature());
00107       nphIntegratorPtr_->setup();
00108       
00109       // generate integrator variables from a Gaussian distribution
00110       Random& random = simulation().random();
00111       
00112       double temp = system().energyEnsemble().temperature();
00113        
00114       double volume = system().boundary().volume();
00115       
00116       if (mode_ == Cubic) {
00117          // one degree of freedom
00118     // barostat_energy = 1/2 (1/W) eta_x^2
00119          double sigma = sqrt(temp/barostatMass_);
00120          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(0, sigma*random.gaussian());
00121       } else if (mode_ == Tetragonal) {
00122          // two degrees of freedom
00123          // barostat_energy = 1/2 (1/W) eta_x^2 + 1/2 (1/(2W)) eta_y^2
00124          double sigma1 = sqrt(temp/barostatMass_);
00125          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(0, sigma1*random.gaussian());
00126          double sigma2 = sqrt(temp/barostatMass_/2.0);
00127          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(1, sigma2*random.gaussian());
00128       } else if (mode_ == Orthorhombic) { 
00129          // three degrees of freedom 
00130          // barostat_energy = 1/2 (1/W) (eta_x^2 + eta_y^2 + eta_z^2)
00131          double sigma = sqrt(temp/barostatMass_);
00132          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(0, sigma*random.gaussian());
00133          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(1, sigma*random.gaussian());
00134          nphIntegratorPtr_->setEta(2, sigma*random.gaussian());
00135       }
00136 
00137       // Store old energy
00138       oldEnergy  = mdSystemPtr_->potentialEnergy();
00139       oldEnergy += mdSystemPtr_->kineticEnergy();
00140       oldEnergy += system().boundaryEnsemble().pressure()*volume;
00141       oldEnergy += nphIntegratorPtr_->barostatEnergy();
00142 
00143       // Run a short MD simulation
00144       for (int iStep = 0; iStep < nStep_; ++iStep) {
00145          nphIntegratorPtr_->step();
00146       }
00147       
00148       volume = system().boundary().volume();
00149 
00150       // Calculate new energy
00151       newEnergy  = mdSystemPtr_->potentialEnergy();
00152       newEnergy += mdSystemPtr_->kineticEnergy();
00153       newEnergy += system().boundaryEnsemble().pressure()*volume;
00154       newEnergy += nphIntegratorPtr_->barostatEnergy();
00155 
00156       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00157       accept = random.metropolis( boltzmann(newEnergy-oldEnergy) );
00158 
00159       // Accept move
00160       if (accept) {
00161          
00162          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00163          // Rebuild the McSystem cellList using the new positions.
00164          system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00165          #endif
00166 
00167          // Increment counter for the number of accepted moves.
00168          incrementNAccept();
00169 
00170       } else {
00171          
00172          // Restore old boundary lengths
00173          system().boundary().setOrthorhombic(oldLengths);
00174 
00175          // Restore old atom positions
00176          for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpec; ++iSpec) {
00177             mdSystemPtr_->begin(iSpec, molIter);
00178             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00179                molIter->begin(atomIter);
00180                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00181                   atomIter->position() = oldPositions_[atomIter->id()];
00182                }
00183             }
00184          }
00185 
00186       }
00187 
00188       return accept;
00189 
00190    }
00191 
00192 }
00193 #endif
